nodes.text: The CFC-100 was a corporate watcher computer manufactured by CoreDataFiles. It was used by businessmen to keep track of the actions of corporations in the galaxy, and provided financial tracking data on over 10,000 business conglomerates including the Galaxy 500, Surnack's Sentinel 100, and the Tradoc Core Index. The computer's core package included a service contract with the Bank of the Core's Investment Division.
